attributes.action: to start listening to the electorate, at all times not 3 months before an election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the reason i ask is because succesive goverments in a build up to a  election start saying we will listen to concerns of the people but when elected we don't see them again. example being the gurkas

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
